TITLE: Collaboration Tools
DEF: Digital platforms that facilitate teamwork and communication
TASK: The Collaboration Tools pattern utilizes digital platforms to enhance teamwork and communication among learners, aiming to improve group work efficiency and effectiveness. By addressing challenges such as lack of communication, disorganization, and unequal workload distribution, this pattern helps learners work together more effectively, share resources, and coordinate tasks. However, its effectiveness relies heavily on a robust digital infrastructure and the learners' digital literacy.
